verses.text: Then \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and sat him \w down|strong="H3427"\w* there: and, behold, the \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* of whom \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w came|strong="H5674"\w* by; unto whom he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Ho|strong="H1945"\w*, \w such|strong="H6423"\w* a \w one|strong="H0492"\w*! turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, sit \w down|strong="H3427"\w* here. And he turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, and sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Sit ye \w down|strong="H3427"\w* here. And they sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*, \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, that is come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* out of the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w selleth|strong="H4376"\w* a \w parcel|strong="H2513"\w* of \w land|strong="H7704"\w*, which \add was\add* our \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Elimelech’s|strong="H0458"\w*:

And I \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* to \w advertise|strong="H1540"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* \add it\add* before the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w*, and before the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. If thou wilt \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add it\add*, \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add it:\add* but if thou wilt not \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add it, then\add* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* me, that I may \w know|strong="H3045"\w*: for \add there is\add* none to \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add it\add* \w beside|strong="H2108"\w* thee; and I \add am\add* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 4.4 \ft I thought…: Heb. I said, I will reveal in thine ear\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*, What \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou \w buyest|strong="H7069"\w* the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, thou must \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \add it\add* also of \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* the \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*, the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, to raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* upon his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

¶ And the \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add it\add* for myself, lest I \w mar|strong="H7843"\w* mine own \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* thou my \w right|strong="H1353"\w* to thyself; for I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add it\add*.

Now this \add was the manner\add* in former \w time|strong="H6440"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* concerning \w redeeming|strong="H1353"\w* and concerning \w changing|strong="H8545"\w*, for to \w confirm|strong="H6965"\w* all \w things|strong="H1697"\w*; a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* plucked \w off|strong="H8025"\w* his \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: and this \add was\add* a \w testimony|strong="H8584"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Therefore the \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*, \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* \add it\add* for thee. So he drew \w off|strong="H8025"\w* his \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w*.

¶ And \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, and \add unto\add* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Ye \add are\add* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that I have \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* all that \add was\add* \w Elimelech’s|strong="H0458"\w*, and all that \add was\add* \w Chilion’s|strong="H3630"\w* and \w Mahlon’s|strong="H4248"\w*, of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*.

Moreover \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* the \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*, the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Mahlon|strong="H4248"\w*, have I \w purchased|strong="H7069"\w* to be my \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, to raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* upon his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, that the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* be not cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H5973"\w* his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and from the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: ye \add are\add* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add We are\add* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*. The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* like \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* and like \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w*, which \w two|strong="H8147"\w* did \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thou \w worthily|strong="H2428"\w* in \w Ephratah|strong="H0672"\w*, and be \w famous|strong="H7121"\w* in \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*:\f + \fr 4.11 \ft do thou…: or, get thee riches, or, power\f*\f + \fr 4.11 \ft be famous: Heb. proclaim thy name\f*

And let thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w* be like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w*, whom \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* unto \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee of this young \w woman|strong="H5291"\w*.

¶ So \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*, and she was his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: and when he went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto her, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* her \w conception|strong="H2032"\w*, and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which hath not \w left|strong="H7673"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* without a \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*, that his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* may be \w famous|strong="H7121"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 4.14 \ft left…: Heb. caused to cease unto thee\f*\f + \fr 4.14 \ft kinsman: or, redeemer\f*

And he shall be unto thee a \w restorer|strong="H7725"\w* of \add thy\add* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, and a \w nourisher|strong="H3557"\w* of thine old \w age|strong="H7872"\w*: for thy daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, which \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* thee, which is \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to thee than \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, hath \w born|strong="H3205"\w* him.\f + \fr 4.15 \ft a nourisher of: Heb. to nourish\f*\f + \fr 4.15 \ft thine…: Heb. thy gray hairs\f*

And \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* it in her \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and became \w nurse|strong="H0539"\w* unto it.

And the women her \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* it a \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There is a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* to \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*; and they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*: he \add is\add* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.
¶ Now these \add are\add* the \w generations|strong="H8435"\w* of \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w*: \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*,
And \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ram|strong="H7410"\w*, and \w Ram|strong="H7410"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*,

And \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w*, and \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Salmon|strong="H8009"\w*,\f + \fr 4.20 \ft Salmon: or, Salmah\f*
And \w Salmon|strong="H8012"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*, and \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*,
And \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, and \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.
